info.author: Phil Mayes
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.description:
Software oscilloscope using Python and tkinter.
        Supports multiple sources: socket, file, audio, USB, hardware.
        Displays data by samples, time or frequency.
        Scales the input automatically or manually.
        Code is available at https://sourceforge.net/projects/pydatascope/
info.name: pydatascope
info.html_description:
Software oscilloscope using Python and tkinter.
Supports multiple sources: socket, file, audio, USB, hardware. Displays data by samples, time or frequency. Scales the input automatically or manually. Code is available at https://sourceforge.net/projects/pydatascope/
